title: Users can't access some system functionalities of certain capabilities
content:
Users can't access some system functionalities of the Cloud Management, UCMDB, and Operations Orchestration capabilities even if they are assigned the corresponding permissions.

Cause

One possible cause is that the user's role and group information is inconsistent between Service Management and IdM.

To confirm that this is the cause of the issue, compare the user's groups and roles in IdM with those in Service Management. If they are not the same, then you can use the following solution to fix the issue.

Solution

In Service Management, remove groups and roles from the user, save the changes, and then assign them to the user again.
